import React, { Component } from "react"; import TableHeader from "./common/tableHeader"; import Like from "./common/like"; class MoviesTable extends Component { columns = [ { path: "title", label: "Title" }, { path: "genre.name", label: "Genre" }, { path: "numberinStock", label: "Stock" }, { path: "dailyRentalRate", label: "Rate" }, {}, {}, ]; render() { const { movies, onDelete, onLike, onSort } = this.props; return ( {movies.map((movie) => ( ))}
this.raiseSort("title")} scope="col"> Title this.raiseSort("genre.name")} scope="col"> Genre this.raiseSort("numberInStock")} scope="col"> Stock this.raiseSort("dailyRentalRate")} scope="col"> Rate
{movie.title} {movie.genre.name} {movie.numberInStock} {movie.dailyRentalRate} onLike(movie)} />
); } } export default MoviesTable;
